page.title: 02LANDSCAPE
page.content: Comparing the communities in our'D' block Great Burstead and Ramsden Bellhouse are very similar.South Green and Sunnymede both have large housing developments.In Crays Hill and Sunnymede older,cheap holiday bungalows with large plots are being bought by speculators.The old building is knocked down and a new executive _ type house is built in its place.South Green is the only community with a doctor's surgery,probably because it is one of the largest areas.Crays Hill cannot be classified with any other region but shares many characteristics of the other areas.The shops in the communities are usually used for convenience shopping and tend to be small.Specialist shops andfree car_ parking attract shoppers from outside the area.Weekend shopping is done elsewhere,in large stores in Basildon.
